Sept. 13, 2015 D SCABA Autumn Contest (Second Section)
SCABA Autumn Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Autumn Contest scaba-autumn-contest-second-section
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Best Hymn: Atout Vent Best March: Atout Vent
Best Instrumentalist: Arnaud Peru, Atout Vent Best Horn Section: Atout Vent Best Solo Horn: Peter Maertens: Atout Vent Best Percussion: Atout Vent Conductor's Prize: Chris Bearman
Sept. 8, 2015, 9:56 a.m. Sept. 14, 2015, 9:14 a.m.
1 Brass Band Atout Vent William Houssoy The Saga of Haakon the Good
2 Regent Community Brass Chris Bearman Music for a Festival [Sparke]
3 LGB Brass Ian Stewart The Dark Side of the Moon
4 Epping Forest Band Keith Schroeter Fire In The Blood
5 Cold Ash Brass Jemma Johnstone The Graces of Love
